# vigour-config


### merging package.json
```javascript
var pckg = require('./package.json')
config = new Config(service_package_json)
  .merge(project_package_json)
  .resolve('#master')
```

### in node-js
```javascript
process.env.CONFIG_PARAM = 'thisIsFromEnvironment'
var config
config = new Config()
console.log(config.thisIsFromEnvironment)
```
